GK19bhall_pu:3: yuṣmākam ambaramaṇeḥ prathame mayūkhās te maṅgalaṃ vidadhatūdayarāgabhājaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:4: kurvanti ye divasajanmamahotsaveṣu sindūrapāṭalamukhīr iva dikpurandhrīḥ // Bhall_2 //
GK19bhall_pu:5: baddhā yad arpaṇaraseṇa vimardapūrvam arthān kathaṃ jhaṭiti tān prakṛtān na dadyuḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:6: caurā ivātimṛdavo mahatāṃ kavīnām arthāntarāṇy api haṭhād vitaranti śabdāḥ // Bhall_3 //
GK19bhall_pu:7: kāco maṇir maṇiḥ kāco yeṣāṃ te 'nye hi dehinaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:8: santi te sudhiyo yeṣāṃ kācaḥ kāco maṇir maṇiḥ // Bhall_4 //
GK19bhall_pu:9: nanv āśrayasthitir iyaṃ tava kālakūṭa kenottarottaraviśiṣṭapadopadiṣṭā /
GK19bhall_pu:10: prāg arṇavasya hṛdaye vṛṣalakṣmaṇo 'tha kaṇṭhe 'dhunā vasasi vāci punaḥ khalānām // Bhall_5 //
GK19bhall_pu:11: draviṇam āpadi bhūṣaṇam utsave śaraṇam ātmabhaye niśi dīpakaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:12: bahuvidhābhyupakārabharakṣamo bhavati ko 'pi bhavān iva sanmaṇiḥ // Bhall_6 //
GK19bhall_pu:14: śabdamātram api soḍhum akṣamā bhūṣaṇasya guṇinaḥ samutthitam // Bhall_7 //
GK19bhall_pu:15: māne necchati vārayaty upaśame kṣmām ālikhantyāṃ hriyāṃ svātantrye parivṛtya tiṣṭhati karau vyādhūya dhairyaṃ gate /
GK19bhall_pu:16: tṛṣṇe tvām anubadhnatā phalam iyatprāptaṃ janenāmunā yaḥ spṛṣṭo na padā sa eva caraṇau spraṣṭuṃ na saṃmanyate // Bhall_8 //
GK19bhall_pu:17: patatu vāriṇi yātu digantaraṃ viśatu vahnim atha vrajatu kṣitim /
GK19bhall_pu:18: ravir asāv iyatāsya guṇeṣu kā sakalalokacamatkṛtiṣu kṣatiḥ // Bhall_9 //
GK19bhall_pu:19: sadvṛttayaḥ sadasadarthavivekino ye te paśya kīdṛśam amuṃ samudāharanti /
GK19bhall_pu:20: caurāsatīprabhṛtayo bruvate yad asya tad gṛhyate yadi kṛtaṃ tad ahaskareṇa // Bhall_10 //
GK19bhall_pu:21: pātaḥ pūṣṇo bhavati mahate nopatāpāya yasmāt kāle prāpte ka iha na yayur yānti yāsyanti vāstam* /
GK19bhall_pu:22: etāvat tu vyathayatitarāṃ lokabāhyais tamobhis tasminn eva prakṛtimahati vyomni labdho 'vakāśaḥ // Bhall_11 //
GK19bhall_pu:26: paṅktau viśantu gaṇitāḥ pratilomavṛttyā pūrve bhaveyur iyatāpy athavā traperan /
GK19bhall_pu:27: santo 'py asanta iva cet pratibhānti bhānor bhāsāvṛte nabhasi śītamayūkhamukhyāḥ // Bhall_12 //
GK19bhall_pu:28: gate tasmin bhanau tribhuvanasamunmeṣaviraha- vyathāṃ candro neṣyaty anucitam ato nāsty asadṛśam /
GK19bhall_pu:29: idaṃ cetastāpaṃ janayatitarām atra yad amī pradīpāḥ saṃjātās timirahatibaddhodhuraśikhāḥ // Bhall_13 //
GK19bhall_pu:30: sūryād anyatra yac candre 'py arthāsaṃsparśi tat kṛtam /
GK19bhall_pu:31: khadyota iti kītasya nāma tuṣṭena kena cit // Bhall_14 //
GK19bhall_pu:33: ghanasantamasamalīmasa- daśadiśi niśi yad virājasi tad anyat // Bhall_15 //
GK19bhall_pu:34: sattvāntaḥsphuritāya vā kṛtaguṇādhyāropatucchāya vā tasmai kātaramohanāya mahaso leśāya mā svasti bhūt /
GK19bhall_pu:35: yacchāyācchuraṇāruṇena khacatā khadyotanā khadyotanāmnāmunā kīṭenāhitayā hi jaṅgamamaṇibhrāntyā viḍambyāmahe // Bhall_16 //
GK19bhall_pu:38: atyunnativyasaninaḥ śiraso 'dhunaiṣa svasyaiva cātakaśiśuḥ praṇayaṃ vidhattām /
GK19bhall_pu:39: asyaitad icchati yadi pratatāsu dikṣu tāḥ svacchaśītamadhurāḥ kva nu nāma nāpaḥ // Bhall_18 //
GK19bhall_pu:40: so 'pūrvaḥ rasanāviparyayavidhis tat karṇayoś cāpalaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sā madavismṛtasvaparadik kiṃ bhūyasoktena vā /
GK19bhall_pu:41: itthaṃ niścitavān asi bhramara he yad vāraṇo 'dyāpy asā* antaḥśūnyakaro niṣeyata iti bhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ // Bhall_19 //
GK19bhall_pu:44: tad vaidagdhyaṃ samucitapayastoyatattvaṃ vivektuṃ saṃlāpās te sa ca mṛdupadanyāsahṛdyo vilāsaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:45: āstāṃ tāvad baka yadi tathā vetthi kiṃ cic chlathāṃsas tūṣṇīm evāsitum api sakhe tvaṃ kathaṃ me na haṃsaḥ // Bhall_20 //
GK19bhall_pu:46: pathi nipatitāṃ śūnye dṛṣṭvā nirāvaraṇānāṃ navadadhighaṭīṃ garvonnaddhaḥ samuddhurakandharaḥ* /
GK19bhall_pu:47: nijasamucitās tās tāś ceṣṭā vikāraśatākulo yadi na kurute kākaḥ kāṇaḥ kadā nu kariṣyati // Bhall_21 //
GK19bhall_pu:51: nṛtyantaḥ śikhino manoharam amī śrāvyaṃ paṭhantaḥ śukā vīkṣyante na ta eva khalv iha ruṣā vāryanta evāthavā /
GK19bhall_pu:52: pānthastrīgṛham iṣṭalābhakathanāl labdhānvayenāmunā sampraty etad anargalaṃ balibhujā māyāvinā bhujyate // Bhall_22 //
GK19bhall_pu:53: karabha rasabhāt kroṣṭuṃ vāñcchasy aho śravaṇajvaraḥ śaraṇam athavānṛjvī dīrghā tavaiva śirodharā /
GK19bhall_pu:55: samaye ko jānīte bhaviṣyati kasya kim // Bhall_23 //
GK19bhall_pu:57: kathaṃ kamalanālasya mā bhūvan bhaṅgurā guṇāḥ // Bhall_24 //
GK19bhall_pu:58: kiṃ dīrghadīrgheṣu guṇeṣu padma siteṣv avacchādanakāraṇaṃ te /
GK19bhall_pu:59: asty eva tān paśyati ced anāryā trasteva lakṣmīr na padaṃ vidhatte // Bhall_25 //
GK19bhall_pu:60: na paṅkād udbhūtir na jalasahavāsavyasanitā vapur digdhaṃ kāntyā sthalanalinaratnadyutimuṣā /
GK19bhall_pu:61: vyadhāsyad durvedhā hṛdayalaghimānaṃ yadi na te tvam evaiko lakṣmyāḥ paramam abhaviṣyaḥ padam iha // Bhall_26 //
GK19bhall_pu:62: uccair uccaratu ciraṃ cirī vartmani taruṃ samāruhya /
GK19bhall_pu:64: śaṅkho 'sthiśeṣaḥ sphuṭito mṛto vā procchvāsyate 'nyaśvasitena satyam /
GK19bhall_pu:65: kiṃ tūccaraty eva hi so 'sya śabdaḥ śrāvyo na yo yo na sadarthaśaṃsī // Bhall_28 //
GK19bhall_pu:67: yathāphalarddhisvārohā hā mātaḥ kvāgaman drumāḥ // Bhall_29 //
GK19bhall_pu:68: sādhv eva tavidhāv asya vedhā kliṣṭo na yad vṛthā /
GK19bhall_pu:70: grathitaḥ eṣa mithaḥ kṛtaśṛṅkhalair viṣadharair adhiruhya mahājaḍaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:71: malayajaḥ sumanobhir anāśrito yad ata eva phalena viyujyate // Bhall_31 //
GK19bhall_pu:72: candane viṣadharān sahāmahe vastu sundaram aguptimatkṛtaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:73: rakṣituṃ vada kim ātmagauravaṃ sañcitāḥ khadira kaṇṭakās tvayā // Bhall_32 //
GK19bhall_pu:74: yat kiñ canānucitam apy ucitānuvṛtti kiṃ candanasya na kṛtaṃ kusumaṃ phalaṃ vā /
GK19bhall_pu:75: lajjāmahe vayam upakrama eva yāntas tasyāntikaṃ parigṛhītabṛhatkuṭhārāḥ // Bhall_33 //
GK19bhall_pu:76: labdhaṃ cirād amṛtavat kim amṛtyave syād dīrghaṃ rasāyanavad āyur api pradadyāt /
GK19bhall_pu:77: etat phalaṃ yad ayam adhvagaśāpadagdhaḥ stabdhaḥ khalaḥ phalati varṣaśatena tālaḥ // Bhall_34 //
GK19bhall_pu:78: chinnas tṛptasuhṛt sa candanatarur yūyaṃ palāyyāgatā bhogābhyāsasukhāsikāḥ pratidinaṃ tā vismṛtās tatra vaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:79: daṃṣṭrākoṭiviṣolkayā pratikṛtaṃ tasya prahartur na cet kiṃ tenaiva saha svayaṃ na lavaśo yātāḥ stha bho bhoginaḥ // Bhall_35 //
GK19bhall_pu:80: saṃtoṣaḥ kim aśaktatā kim athavā tasminn asambhāvanā lobho vāyam utānavasthitir iyaṃ pradveṣa evāthavā /
GK19bhall_pu:81: āstāṃ khalv anurūpayā saphalayā puṣpaśriyā durvidhe sambandho 'nanurūpayāpi na kṛtaḥ kiṃ candanasya tvayā // Bhall_36 //
GK19bhall_pu:82: kiṃ jāto 'si catuṣpathe ghanatarachāyo 'si kiṃ chāyayā saṃyuktaphalito 'si kiṃ phalabharaiḥ pūrṇo 'si kiṃ sannataḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:83: he sadvṛkṣa sahasva samprati sakhe śākhāśikhākarṣaṇa- kṣobhāmoṭanabhañjanāni janataḥ svarair eva duśceṣṭitaiḥ // Bhall_37 //
GK19bhall_pu:84: sanmūlaḥ prathitonnatir ghanalasacchāyaḥ sthitaḥ satpathe sevyaḥ sadbhir itīdam ākalayatā tālo 'dhvagenāśritaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:85: puṃsaḥ śaktir iyaty asau tu phaled adyāthavā śvo 'thavā kāle kvāpy athavā kadācid athavā na tv eva vedhāḥ prabhuḥ // Bhall_38 //
GK19bhall_pu:86: tvanmūle puruṣāyuṣaṃ gatam idaṃ dehena saṃśuṣyatā kṣodīyaṃsam api kṣaṇaṃ param atah śaktiḥ kutaḥ prāṇitum /
GK19bhall_pu:87: tat svasty astu vivṛdddhim ehi mahatīm adyāpi kā nas tvarā kalyāṇin/
GK19bhall_pu:90: paśyāmaḥ kim ayaṃ prapatsyata iti svalpābhrasiddhakriyair darpād dūram upekṣitena balavat karmeritair mantribhiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:91: labdhātmaprasareṇa rakṣitum athāśakyena muktvāśāniṃ sphītas tādṛg aho ghanena ripuṇā dagdho girigrāmakaḥ // Bhall_40 //
GK19bhall_pu:92: sādhūtpātaghanauga sādhu sudhiyā dhyeyaṃ dharāyām idaṃ ko 'nyaḥ kartum alaṃ tavaiva ghaṭate karmedṛśaṃ duṣkaram /
GK19bhall_pu:93: sarvasyaupayikāni yāni katicit kśetrāṇi tatrāśaniḥ sarvān aupāyikeṣu dagdhasikatāraṇyeṣv apāṃ vṛṣṭayaḥ // Bhall_41 //
GK19bhall_pu:94: labdhāyāṃ tṛṣi gomṛgasya vihagasyānyasay vā kasya cid vṛṣṭyā syād bhavadīyayopakṛtir ity āstāṃ davīyasy adaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:95: asyātyantam abhājanasya jaladāraṇyoṣarasyāpi kiṃ jātā paśya punaḥ punar eva paruṣā saivāsya dagdhā chaviḥ // Bhall_42 //
GK19bhall_pu:96: saṃtyajya pānācamanocitāni toyāntarāṇy asya siseviṣos tvām /
GK19bhall_pu:97: nirjaina, jihreṣi jalair janasya jaghanyakāryaupayikaiḥ payodhe // Bhall_43 //
GK19bhall_pu:98: āstrīśiśu prathita eṣa pipāsitebhyaḥ saṃrakṣyate 'mbudhir apeyatayaiva dūrāt /
GK19bhall_pu:99: daṃṣṭrākarālamakarālikarālitābhiḥ kiṃ bhāyayaty aparam ūrmiparamparābhiḥ // Bhall_44 //
GK19bhall_pu:100: svamāhātmyaślāghāgurugahanagarjābhir abhitaḥ kruśitvā kliśnāsi śrutikuharam abdhe kim iti naḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:101: ihaikaś cūḍālo hy ajani kalaśād yasya sakalaiḥ pipāsor ambhobhiś culukam api no bhartum aśakaḥ // Bhall_45 //
GK19bhall_pu:102: sarvāsāṃ trijagaty apām iyam asāv ādhāratā tāvakī prollāso 'yam athāmbudhe 'mbunilaye seyaṃ mahāsattvatā /
GK19bhall_pu:103: sevitvā bahubhaṅgabhīṣaṇatanuṃ tvām eva velācala- grāvasrotasi pānatāpakalaho yat kvāpi nirvāpyate // Bhall_46 //
GK19bhall_pu:104: nodvegaṃ yadi yāsi yady avahitaḥ karṇaṃ dadāsi kṣaṇaṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmi yad ambudhe kim api tan niścitya dehy uttaram /
GK19bhall_pu:105: nairāśyātiśayātimātranibhṛtair niḥśvasya yad dṛśyase tṛṣyadbhiḥ pathikaiḥ kiyat tadadhikaṃ syād aurvadāhād ataḥ // Bhall_47 //
GK19bhall_pu:107: viśuddhiḥ kīdṛśī tasya jaḍasya sphaṭikāśmanaḥ // Bhall_48 //
GK19bhall_pu:108: cintāmaṇe bhuvi na kena cid īśvareṇa mūrdhnā dhṛto 'ham iti mā sma sakhe viṣīdaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:109: nāsty eva hi tvadadhiropaṇapuṇyabīja- saubhāgyayogyam iha kasya cid uttamāṅgam // Bhall_49 //
GK19bhall_pu:110: saṃvittir asty atha guṇāḥ pratibhānti loke taddhi praśastam iha kasya kim ucyatāṃ vā /
GK19bhall_pu:111: nanv evam eva sumaṇe luṭa yāvad āyus tvaṃ me jagatprasahane 'tra kathāśarīram // Bhall_50 //
GK19bhall_pu:112: cintāmaṇes tṛṇamaṇeś ca kṛtaṃ vidhātrā kenobhayor api maṇitvam adaḥ samānam /
GK19bhall_pu:113: naiko 'rthitāni dadann arthijanāya khinno gṛhṇañ jarattṛṇalavaṃ tu na lajjate 'nyaḥ // Bhall_51 //
GK19bhall_pu:114: dūre kasya cid eṣa ko 'py akṛtadhīr naivāsya vetty antaraṃ mānī ko 'pi na yācate mṛgayate ko 'py alpam alpāśayaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:115: itthaṃ prārthitadānadurvyasanino naudāryarekhojjvalā jātānaipuṇadustareṣu nikaṣasthāneṣu cintāmaṇeḥ // Bhall_52 //
GK19bhall_pu:116: parārthe yaḥ pīḍām anubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāro 'py abhimataḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:117: na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ sa yadi bhṛśam akṣetrapatitaḥ kim ikṣor doṣo 'yaṃ na punar aguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ // Bhall_53 //
GK19bhall_pu:118: āmrāḥ kiṃ phalabhāranamraśiraso ramyā kim ūṣmacchidaḥ sacchāyāḥ kadalīdrumāḥ surabhayaḥ kiṃ puṣpitāś campakāḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:119: etās tā niravagrahograkarabhollīḍhārdharūḍhāḥ punaḥ śamyo bhrāmyasi mūḍha nirmaruti kiṃ mithyaiva martuṃ marau // Bhall_54 //
GK19bhall_pu:120: ājanmanaḥ kuśalam aṇv api re kujanman pāṃso tvayā yadi kṛtaṃ vada tat tvam eva /
GK19bhall_pu:121: utthāpito 'sy analasārathinā yad arthaṃ duṣṭena tat kuru kalaṅkaya viśvam etat // Bhall_55 //
GK19bhall_pu:122: nissārāḥ sutarāṃ laghuprakṛtayo yogyā na kārye kva cic chuṣyanto 'dya jarattṛṇādyavayavāḥ prāptāḥ svatantreṇa ye /
GK19bhall_pu:123: antaḥsāra[arāṅmukhena dhig aho te mārutenāmunā paśyātyantacalena sadma mahatām ākāśam āropitā // Bhall_56 //
GK19bhall_pu:124: ye jātyā laghavaḥ sadaiva gaṇanāṃ yātā na ye kutra cit padbhyām eva vimarditāḥ pratidinaṃ bhūmau nilīnāś ciram /
GK19bhall_pu:125: utkṣiptāś capalāśayena marutā paśyāntarikṣe 'dhunā tuṅgānām uparisthitiṃ kṣitibhṛttāṃ kurvanty amī pāṃsavaḥ // Bhall_57 //
GK19bhall_pu:126: re dandaśūka yad ayogyam apīśvaras tvāṃ vātsalyatau nayati nūpuradhāma satyam /
GK19bhall_pu:127: āvarjitālikulajhaṃkṛtir mūrcchitāni kiṃ śiñjitāni bhavataḥ kṣayam eva kartum // Bhall_58 //
GK19bhall_pu:128: maulau sanmaṇayo gṛhaṃ giriguhā tyāgitvam ātmatvaco niryatnopanataś caiva vṛttir anilair ekatra caryedṛśī /
GK19bhall_pu:129: anyatrānṛju vartma vāg dvirasanā dṛṣṭau viṣaṃ dṛśyate yā dhik tām anu dīpako jvalati bho bhogin sakhe kiṃ nv idam // Bhall_59 //
GK19bhall_pu:131: kiṃ kaustubhena vihito bhavato na nāma yācñāprasāritakaraḥ puruṣottamo 'pi // Bhall_60 //
GK19bhall_pu:132: bhūyāṃsy asya mukhāni nāma viditaivāste mahāprāṇatā kadravāḥ satprasavo 'yam atra kupite cintyaṃ yathedaṃ jagat /
GK19bhall_pu:133: trailokyādbhutam īdṛśaṃ tu caritaṃ śeṣasya yenāpi sā pronmṛjyeva nivartitā viṣadharajñāteyadurvṛttitā // Bhall_61 //
GK19bhall_pu:134: varṣe samasta ekaikaḥ ślāghyaḥ ko 'py eṣa vāsaraḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:135: janair mahattayā nīto yo na pūrvair na cāparaḥ // Bhall_62 //
GK19bhall_pu:136: ābaddhakṛtrimasaṭājaṭilāṃsabhittir āropito mṛgapateḥ padavīṃ yadi śvā /
GK19bhall_pu:137: mattebhakumbhataṭapāṭanalampaṭasya nādaṃ kariṣyati kathaṃ hariṇādhipasya // Bhall_63 //
GK19bhall_pu:138: kim idam ucitaṃ śuddheḥ śliṣṭaṃ svapakṣasamunnateḥ phalapariṇater yuktaṃ prāptaṃ guṇapraṇayasya vā /
GK19bhall_pu:139: kṣaṇam upagataḥ karṇopāntaṃ parasya puraḥ sthitān viśikha nipatan krūraṃ dūrān nṛśaṃsa nihaṃsi yat // Bhall_64 //
GK19bhall_pu:140: amī ye dṛśyante nanu subhagarūpāḥ saphalatā bhavaty eṣāṃ yasya kṣaṇam upagatānāṃ viṣayatām /
GK19bhall_pu:141: nirāloke loke katham idam aho cakṣur adhunā samaṃ jātaṃ sarvair na samam athavānyair avayavaiḥ // Bhall_65 //
GK19bhall_pu:142: āhūteṣu vihaṅgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhevāridhi vā vasaṃs tṛṇamaṇir dhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam /
GK19bhall_pu:143: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhik sāmānyam acetanaṃ prabhum ivānāmṛṣṭatattvāntaram // Bhall_66 //
GK19bhall_pu:144: hemakāra sudhiye namo 'stu te dustareṣu bahuśaḥ parīkṣitum /
GK19bhall_pu:145: kāñcanābharaṇam aśmanā samaṃ yat tvayaivam adhiropyate tulām // Bhall_67 //
GK19bhall_pu:146: vṛtta eva sa ghaṭo 'ndhakūpa yas tvatprasādam api netum akṣamah /
GK19bhall_pu:147: mudritaṃ tv adhamaceṣṭitaṃ tvayā tanmukhāmbukaṇikāḥ pratīcchatā // Bhall_68 //
GK19bhall_pu:148: tṛṇamaṇer manujasya ca tattvataḥ kim ubhayor vipulāśayatocyate /
GK19bhall_pu:150: śatapadī sati pādaśate kṣamā yadi na goṣpadam apy ativartitum /
GK19bhall_pu:151: kim iyatā dvipadasya hanumato jalanidhikramaṇe vivadāmahe // Bhall_70 //
GK19bhall_pu:153: phalavidhānakathāpi na mārgaṇe kim iha lubdhakabālagṛhe 'dhunā // Bhall_71 //
GK19bhall_pu:154: tanutṛṇāgradhṛtena hṛtaś ciraṃ ka iva tena na mauktikaśaṅkayā /
GK19bhall_pu:155: sa jalabindur aho viparītadṛg jagad idaṃ vayam atra sacetanāḥ // Bhall_72 //
GK19bhall_pu:156: budhyāmahe na bahudhāpi vikalpayantaḥ kair nāmabhir vyapadiśema mahāmatīṃs tān /
GK19bhall_pu:159: yeṣām aśeṣabhuvanābharaṇasya hemnas tattvaṃ vivektum upalāḥ paramaṃ pramāṇam // Bhall_73 //
GK19bhall_pu:162: saṃrakṣituṃ kṛṣim akāri kṛṣīvalena paśyātmanaḥ pratikṛtis tṛṇapūruṣo 'yam /
GK19bhall_pu:163: stabdhasya niṣkriyatayāstabhiyo 'sya nūnam aśnanti gomṛgagaṇāḥ pura eva sasyam // Bhall_74 //
GK19bhall_pu:164: kasyānimeṣanayane vidite divauko- lokād ṛte jagati te api vai gṛhītvā /
GK19bhall_pu:165: piṇḍaprasāritamukhena time kim etad dṛṣṭaṃ na bāliśa viśad baḍiśaṃ tvayāntaḥ // Bhall_75 //
GK19bhall_pu:166: puṃstvād api pravicaled yadi yady adho 'pi yāyād yadi praṇayane na mahān api syāt /
GK19bhall_pu:167: abhyuddharet tad api viśvam itīdṛśīyaṃ kenāpi dik prakaṭitā puruṣottamena // Bhall_76 //
GK19bhall_pu:168: svālpāśayaḥ svakulaśilpavikalpam eva yaḥ kalpayan skhalati kācavaṇik piśācaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:170: tatpratyarthitayā vṛto na tu kṛtaḥ samyak svatantro bhayāt svasthas tān na nipātayed iti yathākāmaṃ na sampoṣitaḥ* /
GK19bhall_pu:171: saṃśuṣyan pṛṣadaṃśa eṣa kurutāṃ mūkaḥ sthito 'py atra kiṃ gehe kiṃ bahunā 'dhunā gṛhapateś caurrāś caranty ākhavaḥ // Bhall_78 //
GK19bhall_pu:174: evaṃ cet sarasasvabhāvamahimā jāḍyaṃ kim etādṛśaṃ yady eṣā ca nisargataḥ sarasatā kiṃ granthimattedṛśī /
GK19bhall_pu:175: mūlaṃ cec chucipaṅkajaśrutir iyaṃ kasmād guṇā yady amī kiṃ chidrāṇimṛṇāla bhavatas tattvaṃ na manyāmahe // Bhall_79 //
GK19bhall_pu:176: ye digdhveva kṛtā viṣeṇa kusṛtir yeṣāṃ kiyad bhaṇyate lokaṃ hantum anāgasaṃ dvirasanā randhreṣu ye jāgrati /
GK19bhall_pu:177: vyālās te 'pi dadhaty amī sadasator mūḍhā maṇīn mūrdhabhir naucityād guṇaśalināṃ kva cid api bhraṃśo 'sty alaṃ cintayā // Bhall_80 //
GK19bhall_pu:178: aho strīṇāṃ krauryaṃ hatarajani dhik tvām atiśaṭhe vṛthāprakrānteyaṃ timirakabarīviślathadhṛtiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:179: avaktavye pāte jananayananāthasya śaśinaḥ kṛtaṃ snehasyāntocitam udadhimukhyair nanu jaḍaiḥ // Bhall_81 //
GK19bhall_pu:180: aho gehenardī divasavijigīṣājvararujā pradīpo 'yaṃ sthāne glapayati mṛṣāmūn avayavān /
GK19bhall_pu:181: udāttasvacchandākramaṇahṛtaviśvasya tamasaḥ parispandaṃ draṣṭuṃ mukham api ca kiṃ soḍham amunā // Bhall_82 //
GK19bhall_pu:182: nāmāpy anyataror nimīlitam abhūt tat tāvad unmīlitaṃ prasthāne skhalataḥ svavartmani vidher apy udgṛhītaḥ karaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:183: lokaś cāyam aniṣṭadarśanakṛtād dṛgvaiśasān mocito yuktaṃ kāṣṭhika lūnavān yad asi tām āmrālim ākālikīm // Bhall_83 //
GK19bhall_pu:184: vātāhāratayā jagadviṣadharair āśvāsya niḥśeṣitaṃ te grastāḥ punar abhratoyakaṇikātīvravratair barhibhiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:185: te 'pi krūracamūrucarmavasanair nītāḥ kṣayaṃ lubdhakair dambhasya sphuritaṃ vidann api jano jālmo guṇanīhate // Bhall_84 //
GK19bhall_pu:186: ūḍhā yena mahādhuraḥ suviṣame mārge sadaikākinā soḍho yena kadā cid eva na nije goṣṭhe 'nyaśauṇḍadhvaniḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:187: āsīd yas tu gavāṃ gaṇasya tilakas tasyaiva sampraty aho dhik kaṣṭaṃ dhavalasya jātajaraso goḥ paṇyam udghoṣyate // Bhall_85 //
GK19bhall_pu:188: asthānodyogaduḥkhaṃ jahihi na hi nabhaḥ paṅgusaṃcārayogyaṃ svāyāsāyaiva sādho tava śalabha javābhyāsadurvāsaneyam /
GK19bhall_pu:189: te devasyāpy acintyāś caṭulitabhuvanābhogahelāvahelā- mūlotkhātānumārgāgatagiriguravas tārkṣyapakṣāgravātāḥ // Bhall_86 //
GK19bhall_pu:190: candreṇaiva taraṅgabhaṅgimukharaṃ saṃvardhyamānāmbhaso dadyur jīvitam eva kiṃ girisaritsrotāṃsi yady ambudheḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:191: teṣv eva pratisaṃvidhānavikalaṃ paśyatsu sākṣiṣv iva drāg darpoddhuram āgateṣv api na sa kṣīyeta yady anyathā // Bhall_87 //
GK19bhall_pu:192: kilaikaculukena yo munir apāram abdhiṃ papau sahasram api ghasmaro 'vikṛtam eṣa teṣāṃ pibet /
GK19bhall_pu:193: na sambhavati kiṃ tv idaṃ bata vikāsidhāmnā vinā sad apy asad iva sthitaṃ sphuritam anta ojasvinām // Bhall_88 //
GK19bhall_pu:194: grāvāṇo 'tra vibhūṣaṇaṃ trijagato maryādayā sthīyate nanv atraiva vidhuḥ sthito hi vibudhāḥ sambhūya pūrṇāśiṣaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:195: śete codgatanābhipadmavilasadbrahmeha devaḥ svayaṃ daivād eti jaḍaḥ svakukṣibhrtaye so 'py ambudhir nimnatām // Bhall_89 //
GK19bhall_pu:196: anīrṣyā śrotāro mama vacasi ced vacmi tad ahaṃ svapakṣād bhetavyaṃ na tu bahu vipakṣāt prabhavataḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:197: tamasy ākrāntāśe kiyad api hi tejo 'vayavinaḥ svaśaktyā bhānty ete divasakṛti saty eva na punaḥ // Bhall_90 //
GK19bhall_pu:198: etat tasya mukhāt kiyat kamalinīpatre kaṇaṃ vāriṇo yan muktāmaṇir ity amaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvan yad asmād api /
GK19bhall_pu:199: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayiny ādīyamāne śanaiḥ kutroḍḍīyagato mamety anudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥśucā // Bhall_91 //
GK19bhall_pu:200: āste 'traiva sarasy aho bata kiyān saṃtoṣapakṣagraho haṃsasyāsya manāṅ na dhāvati manaḥ śrīdhāmni padme kva cit /
GK19bhall_pu:201: supto 'dyāpi na budhyate tad itarāṃs tāvat pratīkṣāmahe velām ity udaraṃpriyā madhulihaḥ soḍhuṃ kṣaṇaṃ na kṣamāḥ // Bhall_92 //
GK19bhall_pu:202: bhekena kvaṇatā saroṣaparuṣaṃ yat kṛṣṇasarpānane dātuṃ gaṇḍacapetam ujjhitabhiyā hastaḥ samullāsitaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:203: yac cādhomukham akṣiṇī pidadhatā nāgena tatra sthitaṃ tat sarvaṃ viṣamantriṇo bhagavataḥ kasyāpi līlāyitam // Bhall_93 //
GK19bhall_pu:204: mṛtyor āsyam ivātataṃ dhanur idaṃ cāśīviṣābhāḥ śarāḥ śikṣā sāpi jitārjunaprabhrtikā sarvatra nimnā gatiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:205: antaḥ krauryam aho śaṭhasya madhuraṃ hā hāri geyaṃ mukhe vyādhasyāsya yathā bhaviṣyati tathā manye vanaṃ nrimṛgam // Bhall_94 //
GK19bhall_pu:206: ko 'yaṃ bhrāntiprakāras tava pavana padaṃ lokapādāhatīnāṃ tejasvivrātasevye nabhasi nayasi yat pāṃsupūraṃ pratiṣṭhām /
GK19bhall_pu:207: yasminn utthāpyamāne jananayanapathopadravas tāvad āstāṃ kenopāyena sādhyo vapuṣi kaluṣatādoṣa eṣa tvayaiva // Bhall_95 //
GK19bhall_pu:208: ete te vijigīṣavo nṛpagṛhadvārārpitāvekṣaṇāḥ kṣipyante vasuyācanāhitadhiyaḥ kopoddhatair vetribhiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:209: arthebhyo viṣayopabhogavirasair nākāri yair ādaras te tiṣṭhanti manasvinaḥ surasarittīre manohāriṇi // Bhall_96 //
GK19bhall_pu:210: vātā vāntu kadambareṇuśabalā nṛtyantu sarpadviṣaḥ sotsāhā navatoyabhāraguravo muñcantu nādaṃ ghanāḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:211: magnāṃ kāntaviyogaduḥkhadahane māṃ vīkṣya dīnānanāṃ vidyut kiṃ sphurasi tvam apy akaruṇe strītve 'pi tulye sati // Bhall_97 //
GK19bhall_pu:212: prāṇā yena samarpitās tava balād yenaivam utthāpitaḥ skandhe yena ciraṃ dhṛto 'si vidadhe yas te saparyām api /
GK19bhall_pu:213: tasyāntah smitamātrakeṇa janayañ jīvāpahāraṃ kṣaṇād bhrātaḥ pratyupakāriṇāṃ dhuri paraṃ vetālalīlāyase // Bhall_98 //
GK19bhall_pu:214: rajjvā diśaḥ pravitatāḥ salilaṃ viṣeṇa khātā mahī hutabhujā jvalitā vanāntāḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:215: vyādhā padāny anusaranti gṛhītacāpāḥ kaṃ deśam āśrayatu yūthapatir mṛgāṇām // Bhall_99 //
GK19bhall_pu:216: ayaṃ vārām eko nilaya iti ratnākara iti śrito 'smābhis tṛṣṇātaralitamanobhir jalanidhiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:217: ka evaṃ jānīte nijakarapuṭīkoṭaragataṃ kṣaṇād enaṃ tāmyattiminikaram āpāsyati muniḥ // Bhall_100 //
GK19bhall_pu:218: viśālaṃ śālmalyā nayanasubhagaṃ vīkṣya kusumaṃ śukasyāsīd buddhiḥ phalam api bhaved asya sadṛśam /
GK19bhall_pu:219: cirāsīnaṃ tasmiṃś ca phalam api daivāt pariṇataṃ vipāke tūlo 'ntaḥ sapadi marutā so 'py apahṛtaḥ // Bhall_101 //
GK19bhall_pu:221: candrāṃśuvṛndavitatadyutim aty amuṣmin- he kālakūṭa tava janma kathaṃ payodhau // Bhall_102 //
GK19bhall_pu:223: chāyārthī kaḥ paśur api bhavati jaradvīrudhāṃ praṇayī // Bhall_103 //
